comment: I am going to bet that our boy obliterates them this evening... Lol my money is totally on Tucker here. Lol Scott Adams likes to point out 'sour' Don Lemon ironic name & we have to wonder if Cuomo would have his own show if he wasn't the little brother of the current Governor and son of a former one?
